ing: 1/2 cup fresh lemon juice, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
n: Non-Traditional Tabbouleh Salad with Pineapple and Pomegranate Seeds
des: "This salad was served at a traditional Lebanese restaurant, and I could not wait to go home and duplicate the taste.  It is definitely a twist on the traditional salad, and my Lebanese brother-in-law insists it should not be called 'tabbouleh.' All I know is that it is very tasty and has the majority of the ingredients of a 'traditional' tabbouleh salad."
ins:
Mix parsley, cucumber, pineapple, pomegranate seeds, onion, and mint in a large bowl. Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice over the salad and toss to coat; season with salt and pepper.
Refrigerate salad until chilled, at least 15 minutes.
